Articles.Content:
Which version of BD hatbat?

Probably the same it had been. I expect the bd update for 1.05 to mess with damage of missiles with the new heat system. Until he updates ksp, mod versions won't change.
i guess i cant submit anymore i have ksp on steam and there is no way to backdate

Nope. 1.0.2 for now please, anything else is ignored.

Hey HatBat, can you provide a progress update for the next episode please? Last we heard was that after VesselMover progress has been sped up greatly but I'd just like to know how much?

Me neither, I just have 1.0.4, they still should work in KSP. I made an awesome cruise missile in .5; looks like I'll need to make a .4 version.

Edit: Okay have a design I LOVE. Two flaws with the .4 version - it takes the entire runway to take off...

...annnnd it's not maneuverable enough. Whiplash engine yooooo! lol, I'll keep working on it.

Edit2: Okay I fixed EVERYTHING wrong with the .4 version, here it is, and I will concentrate on my other post in here now.

Edited November 11, 2015 by Draconiator

i guess i cant submit anymore i have ksp on steam and there is no way to backdate

There is though...

I too was working on cruise missiles, fiirst with the new jet, than with rockets and the .625m tanks. Needs more testing, but lets just say the numbers suprised me...

picture might not be working, link: http://imgur.com/EkeqlTu

Wonder how icbm ai wil handle it.

-JT

Would anyone like to help me work on this craft by arming you will get credit i am awful at arming space craft just message me if your intreasted

This is a submissions thread, if anything unfinished craft belong in rocket builders.

This is a submissions thread, if anything unfinished craft belong in rocket builders.

nope, not even in there

Craft looks nice, how did you manage to balance the thrust?

[quote name='Spearka']nope, not even in there[/QUOTE]
Really, becuase rocket builders says: [COLOR=#333333]Additionally, if you need a rocket built for you, simply post in one of the existing threads asking the 'Company' to design and build you a rocket/craft.
[/COLOR]So while arming something is not making an entire craft, the request would belong there.

[quote name='JTpopcorn']Craft looks nice, how did you manage to balance the thrust?


Really, becuase rocket builders says: [COLOR=#333333]Additionally, if you need a rocket built for you, simply post in one of the existing threads asking the 'Company' to design and build you a rocket/craft.
[/COLOR]So while arming something is not making an entire craft, the request would belong there.[/QUOTE]


wow so you like the craft thanks, with the thrust i dont know what i did i just put on 2 engines and did space testing and i flew normal with some rcs of course
Hatbat, if you are there will you take 1.0.4 crafts? that's what I have. I didn't think to ask what versions you can take.
The blade's missiles are in no way anti capital. They have low impact heads, and low thrust propulsion.

[quote name='Alphasus']The blade's missiles are in no way anti capital. They have low impact heads, and low thrust propulsion.[/QUOTE]

TBH it's not even anti-fighter. I'm sure that a Thalia could tank infinite amounts of those missiles.

I mean, if you don't believe me see Ep. 23 with the Trishulas missiles, they had similar structure and couldn't even get through a Longswords weak armour Edited November 19, 2015 by Spearka
They could have I beams embedded.
Nope, there is only one node attach left, if you think super optimistically. And embedded, non exposed I beams aren't that effective at all.
I have had different experiences besides if the missile impacts fast enough anything is possible.
I would just add a kraken warhead to them, then they would destroy all sizes of ships. Unless thry fixed that...feature.
i am now redisgning my missiles on the blade and the hunter to be faster and harder hitting

My FIRST fighter jet is on the way! Just needs more testing.
